Job.Description: She will help keep Crossgate safe.

Gains.GainTrait: She has become pretty Tough from all of the fights she's been in.
She is getting rather Aggressive from her enjoyment of combat.
She is getting rather fast from all the fighting.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to guard the city during the ${shift}.

Messages.Message:
${name} spotted a thief and was on them before they could blink. Putting a stop to the theft.
<Text Condition="CatchThief>75^CatchThief<95"> ${name} spotted a thief and was on them before they could get away. She is quick.
<Text Condition="CatchThief>50^CatchThief<80"> ${name} spotted a thief. She was able to keep up, and managed to catch them.
<Text Condition="CatchThief<60"> ${name} spotted a thief. Luckily, they weren't a good runner, so even someone as slow as ${name} could keep up, managing to catch them.

${name} spotted a thief. As so as they saw here, they took of running. ${name} was able to chase them for a few minutes, but they ended up giving her the slip in the end.
<Text Condition="CatchThief<60"> ${name} spotted a thief. "Stop, you're under arrest", she calls out. The thief takes off, and after a rather short chase ${name} is left wheezing, having lost sight of her quarry.
